snippet: I stated yesterday that the Masonic Order was making great preparations for the re-interment of the remains of Stephen Girard, on Tuesday next. It is contemplated to place them in a sarcophagus under his statue in Girard College. This morning....

byline.original: Correspondence of The New-York Daily Times

lead_paragraph: I stated yesterday that the Masonic Order was making great preparations for the re-interment of the remains of Stephen Girard, on Tuesday next. It is contemplated to place them in a sarcophagus under his statue in Girard College. This morning.

headline.main: Remains of Stephen Girard--The Telegraph Case--Coal, &c.

abstract: Removal of his remains to the College discussed
